— New widgets for calculating fuel consumption and cost per trip are added
— Trip info widget is updated
— The app now works in background

Leave a review about this update in the App Store. Email us your feedback at support@hudwayapp.com
Minor bug fixes (crashes)
Minor bug fixes (crashes)

— Background operation settings are added
— HUD mode is now remembered and restored automatically
— Screen brightness is increased in HUD mode

— Background operation settings are added
— HUD mode is now remembered and restored automatically
— Screen brightness is increased in HUD mode

— Internet radio widget added
— Fuel economy and cost can be manually adjusted

— Internet radio widget added
— Fuel economy and cost can be manually adjusted

— Try new HUDWAY Go app in Navigation
— Minor bug fixing

— Try new HUDWAY Go app in Navigation
— Minor bug fixing

— HUDWAY Go app is now available in Navigation section. It features offline maps and is made for everyday city commutes.
— The previous version saw a bug when the already installed HUDWAY Go app wouldn't launch by the link in the Navigation section. This has been fixed in this version.

— HUDWAY Go app is now available in Navigation section. It features offline maps and is made for everyday city commutes.
— The previous version saw a bug when the already installed HUDWAY Go app wouldn't launch by the link in the Navigation section. This has been fixed in this version.

— A new widget is now available: Gyro horizon
— When the app is in HUD mode, the brightness is now adjusted automatically
— Chinese version now features links to Gaode and Baidu, and a local speedometer.

— A new widget is now available: Gyro horizon
— When the app is in HUD mode, the brightness is now adjusted automatically
— Chinese version now features links to Gaode and Baidu, and a local speedometer.
— Quite a few bugs fixed
— Quite a few bugs fixed
— Fixed the problem with excessive battery usage
— Fixed the problem with excessive battery usage
- fix a problem with fast battery drain
- fix a problem with fast battery drain
— Fixed an issue with fast battery draining
— Fixed an issue with fast battery draining
– update links to external applications
– update links to external applications
- fix enable location services for iOS 11
- fix enable location services for iOS 11

— All the permissions are now asked straigh away on the revamped welcome screen
— The app now features improved driving behavior scoring
— Radio section is updated, with more stations added, station search implemented, and stations are now displayed in a new way.
— You can now get Premium mode for one day at no charge fo watching an ad video
- We added support of iPad devices!

— Updated localisations
— In the settings, you can now see when your Premium subscription expires
— If you have HUDWAY Cast app installed, you can now access it from HUD Widgets' navigation section.
